# The Basics

Laraset is a module manager using Laravel artisan CLI. Tt's targets all preset Laravel uses. it has the ability to Create Delete Units that wrap all laravel features & preset used in one folder that can exported or event imported from project to another. for now we still in dev phase and supporting only vuejs 2.*

Export/Import

This feature not yet available. we are planing to integrat it in future.

# To use Laraset

By default, Laraset in not installed to use it you should run laraset:install command :

php artisan laraset:install

Then Laraset Folder will be generated within app Folder.
